atten4.ptxt: When installing the No. 1 back door emblem, heat the vehicle body and No. 1 back door emblem using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the vehicle body or No. 1 back door emblem excessively.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the vehicle body.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new No. 1 back door emblem.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body and a new No. 1 back door emblem.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the No. 1 back door emblem.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Align the boss positions and install the No. 1 back door emblem.

atten4.ptxt: Press the No. 1 back door emblem firmly to install it.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL NO. 1 BACK DOOR NAME PLATE

atten4.ptxt: When installing the No. 1 back door name plate, heat the vehicle body and No. 1 back door name plate using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the vehicle body or No. 1 back door name plate excessively.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the vehicle body.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new No. 1 back door name plate.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body and a new No. 1 back door name plate.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the No. 1 back door name plate.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the No. 1 back door name plate in the position shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Press the No. 1 back door name plate firmly to install it.
When installing the back door name plate, heat the vehicle body and back door name plate using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the vehicle body or back door name plate excessively.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the vehicle body.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door name plate.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body and a new back door name plate.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the back door name plate.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the back door name plate in the position shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Press the back door name plate firmly to install it.
When installing the back door mark, heat the vehicle body and back door mark using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the vehicle body or back door mark excessively.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the vehicle body.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door mark.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body and a new back door mark.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the back door mark.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Install the back door mark in the position shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Press the back door mark firmly to install it.
